goals__remit: CEJA supports and promotes the interests of young farmers at EU-level. Its main aim consists of influencing the EU agricultural policy framework in order to facilitate entry into the sector by young people. CEJA also acts as a platform for discussion, debate, consultation and exchange between young farmers and between the EU institutions and young farmers.
